Excellent! I have completed my experiment and can now analyze the results:

- Inclined plane B: 24 ticks
- Inclined plane C: 23 ticks

Since inclined plane C took less time (23 ticks) for the block to slide down compared to inclined plane B (24 ticks), this means inclined plane C has a steeper angle. The block slides faster down steeper inclines due to greater gravitational component along the plane.

Therefore, inclined plane B has the shallowest angle (took longer for the block to slide down).
